thumb.title: 【ボーカロイドカバー曲】ノスタルジア【GUMI】
thumb.description: I almost pulled an all-nighter trying to finish this yesterday -_-;; BUT. I was wise and chose to finish it the next day instead, which I did! There are a few parts that need touching up, but I'm so sick of constantly fixing things on this cover, so I'm uploading it as-is. I can always go back and remaster it if I need to ^^ CREDITS: Gumi NaturalSweet and Gumi English - Internet Co. Nostalgia - MakarafaP UST - Me Visualisers - Freemake (Combined by me) Edited on CapCut for PC and Windows Movie Maker Copyright Disclaimer: - Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for FAIR USE for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statutes that might otherwise be infringing. Non-Profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favour of FAIR USE. I do not claim ownership over the original song.
